name: cloudtrail-tables-query
text: What tables exist in the database that might contain CloudTrail data?
query:
SELECT table_catalog, table_schema, table_name, table_type
FROM information_schema.tables
WHERE LOWER(table_name) LIKE '%cloudtrail%' OR LOWER(table_name) LIKE '%trail%'
ORDER BY table_schema, table_name

meta.sql_description: Find database tables whose names contain {search_term_1} or {search_term_2} (case-insensitive search)
meta.sql_flow_diagram:
flowchart TD Q["Question: What tables exist in the database
that might contain CloudTrail data?"] T1[("information_schema.tables")] F1{"Filter: table_name LIKE '%cloudtrail%'
OR table_name LIKE '%trail%'"} S1["Select: table_catalog, table_schema,
table_name, table_type"] O1{"Order By: table_schema, table_name"} R["Result: List of tables with
CloudTrail-related names"] Q --> T1 T1 --> F1 F1 --> S1 S1 --> O1 O1 --> R
meta.sql_template:
SELECT table_catalog, table_schema, table_name, table_type
FROM information_schema.tables
WHERE LOWER(table_name) LIKE ? OR LOWER(table_name) LIKE ?
ORDER BY table_schema, table_name
